snippet: The top-seeded Federer rallied past Diego Schwartzman, 2-6, 6-2, 7-5, to reach the final at the Istanbul Open.
abstract: Roger Federer defeats Diego Schwartzman to advance to final of Istanbul Open tennis tournament; other tennis matches noted.
lead_paragraph: The top-seeded Federer rallied past Diego Schwartzman, 2-6, 6-2, 7-5, to reach the final at the Istanbul Open.

headline.main: Roger Federer Advances to Istanbul Final
